reporter_caption.center: WILLIAMS v. CARROLL FOODS, INC., 351 So.2d 324 (Miss. 1977)

caption.center: Lonnie E. WILLIAMS and John D. Carroll v. CARROLL FOODS, INC. (formerly
Carroll's Sirloin Pit, Inc.), Freddie O. Carroll, Individually, and

opinion.posture: Appeal from Chancery Court, Lauderdale County; William Neville, Chancellor.
opinion.attorneys:
Arthur D. Currie, Jackson, for appellant.
Singley, Minniece, Neville Hamill, James T. Singley, Deen, Cameron, Prichard Young, J.L. Prichard, Meridian, for appellee.
opinion.panel: Before INZER, P.J., ROBERTSON and BOWLING, JJ., and EDWARD C. PRISOCK, Commissioner.
opinion.opinion_text:
REVERSED AND REMANDED.
PATTERSON, C.J., SMITH, P.J., and SUGG, WALKER, BROOM and LEE, JJ., concur.
